name: Color Friends!
description:
I made a particle simulator for a force like gravity, based on color! If two colors are sufficiently similar, they're attracted to each other, and if they're different enough, they repel! Size matters, too. I added cuteness for good measure! ^o^ For me, that's a form of self-care.

Click to add particles! To reset, refresh the page.

This thing was made during the Self-Care Jam 2016; making a thing on my own, making it cute, and publishing it, is my act of self-care. ^__^ <3

Background: http://www.glitchthegame.com/public-domain-game-ar...
Thanks, Tiny Speck!
